Child.name: else
Child.doc: Executes enclosed effects if limit criteria of preceding 'if' or 'else_if' is not met

Child.name: else_if
Child.doc: Executes enclosed effects if limit criteria of preceding 'if' or 'else_if' is not met, and its own limit is met

Child.name: if
Child.doc: Executes enclosed effects if limit criteria are met
